trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，{T}：选择另一个目标由你操控的神器生物。本回合中，当该生物死去时，将它在你的操控下横置移回战场。

trans-unit.source: There are those who draw false comparisons between the tech-magi of the Adeptus Mechanicus and the xenotechnologists of the necron race. There can be no mercy for such heretics.
trans-unit.target: 有人竟妄将太空死灵的异形科技师与机械神教的机械贤者相提并论。持有这种异端思想者将决不宽贷。

trans-unit.source: Flayed One
trans-unit.target: 剥皮者

trans-unit.source: Lifelink\nFlesh Flayer — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill three cards.
trans-unit.target: 系命 剥离血肉～当CARDNAME进战场时，磨三张牌。

trans-unit.source: Those suspected of carrying the flayer curse are summarily banished, lest the corruption spread to other Necrons.
trans-unit.target: 怀疑身中剥皮诅咒者会被即刻逐放，以免将此等邪疫传染给其他太空死灵。

trans-unit.source: Great Unclean One
trans-unit.target: 大不净者

trans-unit.resname: 40K·35 | Great Unclean One | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reverberating Summons — At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 2 life. Then for each opponent who has less life than you, create a 1/3 black Demon creature token named Plaguebearer of Nurgle.
trans-unit.target: 回响召唤～在你的结束步骤开始时，每位对手各失去2点生命。然后每有一位总生命比你少的对手，便派出一个1/3黑色，名称为纳垢瘟疫行者的恶魔衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Hexmark Destroyer
trans-unit.target: 巫印毁灭者

trans-unit.source: Multi-threat Eliminator — CARDNAME can't be blocked except by six or more creatures.\nUnearth {4}{B}{B} ({4}{B}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 多重威胁抹消炮～CARDNAME只能被六个或更多生物阻挡。 破坟{4}{B}{B}（{4}{B}{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。只能于法术时机破坟。）

trans-unit.source: Illuminor Szeras
trans-unit.target: 光耀者斯泽拉斯

trans-unit.source: Secrets of the Soul — {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Add an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 灵魂秘密～{T}，牺牲另一个生物：加若干{B}，其数量等同于所牺牲生物的法术力值。

trans-unit.source: "Immortality is not quite the same as invulnerability, but it is close enough."
trans-unit.target: 「虽然永生不死与刀枪不入不尽相同，但也无甚区别。」

trans-unit.source: Lokhust Heavy Destroyer
trans-unit.target: 洛克哈斯特重装毁灭者

trans-unit.resname: 40K·38 | Lokhust Heavy Destroyer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nEnmitic Exterminator — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.\nUnearth {5}{B}{B}{B} ({5}{B}{B}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 冥能灭绝炮～当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。 破坟{5}{B}{B}{B}（{5}{B}{B}{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。只能于法术时机破坟。）

trans-unit.source: Lychguard
trans-unit.target: 巫妖卫士

trans-unit.source: Guardian Protocols — {3}{B}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return all legendary creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 守护程序～{3}{B}，牺牲CARDNAME：将所有传奇生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "Only the deathless can truly comprehend the burden of unfailing loyalty."\n—Vargard Obyron of the Sautekh Dynasty
trans-unit.target: 「只有不会死的东西才能真正理解『忠贞不渝』有多沉重。」 ～索泰克王朝的禁卫奥比隆

trans-unit.source: Mandate of Abaddon
trans-unit.target: 阿巴顿的敕令

trans-unit.resname: 40K·40 | Mandate of Abaddon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose target creature you control. Destroy all creatures with power less than that creature's power.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标由你操控的生物。消灭所有力量小于前者的生物。

trans-unit.source: "I am the Arch-fiend, the Despoiler of Worlds, and by my hands shall the false Emperor fall."\n—Abaddon the Despoiler
trans-unit.target: 「吾乃至高恶魔，吾是诸界之掠夺者，吾定将亲手摧毁伪帝统治。」 ～掠夺者阿巴顿

trans-unit.source: Mortarion, Daemon Primarch
trans-unit.target: 恶魔原体莫塔里安

trans-unit.resname: 40K·41 | Mortarion, Daemon Primarch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nPrimarch of the Death Guard — At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 2/2 black Astartes Warrior creature tokens with menace. X can't be greater than the amount of life you lost this turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 死亡守卫原体～在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以支付{X}。若你如此作，则派出X个2/2黑色，具威慑异能的阿斯塔特／战士衍生生物。X不能大于你本回合中失去过的生命数量。

trans-unit.source: Necron Deathmark
trans-unit.target: 太空死灵死印战士

trans-unit.source: Flash\nSynaptic Disintegrator — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target creature and target player mills three cards.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 突触粉碎枪～当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭至多一个目标生物且目标牌手磨三张牌。

trans-unit.source: Necron Overlord
trans-unit.target: 太空死灵霸主

trans-unit.source: Relentless March — {X}, {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Target opponent loses X life.
trans-unit.target: 无情行军～{X}，{T}，横置X个由你操控且未横置的神器：目标对手失去X点生命。

trans-unit.source: "This galaxy once knelt before us, and it will do so again."
trans-unit.target: 「这片银河曾经臣服于我们，历史必将重演。」

trans-unit.source: Nurgle's Conscription
trans-unit.target: 纳垢征召

trans-unit.source: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control, then exile that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌在你操控下从对手坟墓场横置放进战场，然后放逐该牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "In the embrace of the great Nurgle, I am no longer afraid, for with His pestilential favour I have become that which I once most feared: Death."\n—Kulvain Hestarius of the Death Guard
trans-unit.target: 「得受纳垢之拥，我从此不再害怕；如今我已蒙获其疫病加持，转变为我曾最惧怕之物：死亡。」 ～死亡守卫的寇维恩·赫斯塔流斯

trans-unit.source: Nurgle's Rot
trans-unit.target: 纳垢之腐

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature an opponent controls\nWhen enchanted creature dies, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand and you create a 1/3 black Demon creature token named Plaguebearer of Nurgle.
trans-unit.target: 结附于由对手操控的生物 当所结附的生物死去时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上，且你派出一个1/3黑色，名称为纳垢瘟疫行者的恶魔衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Each plaguebearer is formed from the blighted soul of a mortal slain by Nurgle's Rot.
trans-unit.target: 每个瘟疫行者，都来自因纳垢之腐而丧命的凡人枯萎灵魂。

trans-unit.resname: 40K·46 | Out of the Tombs | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Out of the Tombs
trans-unit.target: 古墓苏生

trans-unit.resname: 40K·46 | Out of the Tombs | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put two eon counters on CARDNAME, then mill cards equal to the number of eon counters on it.\nIf you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, instead return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you can't, you lose the game.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在CARDNAME上放置两个亘古指示物，然后磨若干牌，其数量等同于其上的亘古指示物数量。 如果你将抓一张牌但牌库没有牌，则改为将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。若你无法如此作，则你输掉这盘游戏。

trans-unit.source: Plague Drone
trans-unit.target: 瘟疫蜂兵

trans-unit.source: Flying\nRot Fly — If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 腐蝇～如果某对手将获得生命，则改为该牌手失去等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: High-ranking plaguebearers of Nurgle's realm ride into realspace mounted upon Rot Flies—colossal daemonic insects whose appearance is so repugnant it scars the mind.
trans-unit.target: 纳垢领域的高阶瘟疫行者会骑着腐蝇闯入实体宇宙～这种庞巨魔虫外貌极丑，甚至能给心灵留下创伤。

trans-unit.source: Plasmancer
trans-unit.target: 能量巫师

trans-unit.source: Flying\nDynastic Advisor — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 王朝参谋～当CARDNAME进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的沼泽牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Masters of dimensional dissonance, singularity manipulation, and countless other technologies, plasmancers are terrifying to behold.
trans-unit.target: 能量巫师精通维度失谐、奇点摆弄及其他无数科技，每次出现都让人不寒而栗。

trans-unit.source: Poxwalkers
trans-unit.target: 瘟疫行尸

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nCurse of the Walking Pox — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 死触 致疫诅咒～每当你从你手牌以外的任何区域施放咒语时，将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Poxwalkers are victims of the Walking Pox, a cruel virulence which rots the infected to death while keeping them conscious.
trans-unit.target: 行尸瘟疫这种残忍病毒会令感染者在神智清醒的情况下眼睁睁地看着自己的躯体逐渐腐烂，直至死亡；而病殁者便转化为瘟疫行尸。

trans-unit.source: Primaris Eliminator
trans-unit.target: 原铸歼灭者

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose one —\n• Executioner Round — Destroy target creature.\n• Hyperfrag Round — Creatures target player controls get -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～ •处刑者爆矢弹～消灭目标生物。 •超破片弹～由目标牌手操控的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Psychomancer
trans-unit.target: 精神巫师

trans-unit.source: Flying\nHarbinger of Despair — Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield or is put into exile from the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 绝望先兆～每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控且非衍生物的神器从战场进入坟墓场或放逐区时，目标对手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Royal Warden
trans-unit.target: 皇家主管

trans-unit.source: Phalanx Commander — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two tapped 2/2 black Necron Warrior artifact creature tokens.\nUnearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 山阵指挥官～当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个已横置的2/2黑色太空死灵／战士衍生神器生物。 破坟{3}{B}（{3}{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。只能于法术时机破坟。）

trans-unit.source: Sanguinary Priest
trans-unit.target: 圣血祭司

trans-unit.source: Lifelink\nBlood Chalice — Whenever another creature you control dies, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 系命 饮血圣杯～每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Embrace the strength of your Primarch, but deny the Red Thirst, brothers! There is no return from that darkest of paths."
trans-unit.target: 「兄弟们，你们大可自由运用原体之力，但请务必抵御红渴引诱！一旦踏上黑暗道途，便再无回头之路。」

trans-unit.source: Sautekh Immortal
trans-unit.target: 索泰克不朽者

trans-unit.source: Flash\nElite Troops — CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature that died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 精英部队～CARDNAME进战场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于本回合中死去的生物数量。

trans-unit.source: "Nothing clears a battlefield like a Deathstrike missile. Wait. Is something moving out there?"\n—Commander Zander At'lan, Tallarn 115th Armoured Regiment
trans-unit.target: 「清扫战场还是死亡打击导弹最好用。等等。那边是不是有什么动静？」 ～詹德·阿塔兰团长，塔兰第115装甲团

trans-unit.resname: 40K·55 | Shard of the Nightbringer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shard of the Nightbringer
trans-unit.target: 拥夜者碎片

trans-unit.resname: 40K·55 | Shard of the Nightbringer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nDrain Life — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it, target opponent loses half their life, rounded up. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 吸取生命～当CARDNAME进战场时，若它经你施放，则目标对手失去一半生命，小数点后进位。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命数量。

trans-unit.resname: 40K·55 | Shard of the Nightbringer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Aza'gorod, the Nightbringer. The embodiment of death. A killer of stars and of worlds."\n—Illuminor Szeras
trans-unit.target: 「阿札格罗，拥夜者。死亡化身。毁星灭世。」 ～光耀者斯泽拉斯

trans-unit.resname: 40K·56 | Shard of the Void Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shard of the Void Dragon
trans-unit.target: 虚空龙碎片

trans-unit.resname: 40K·56 | Shard of the Void Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nSpear of the Void Dragon — Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each opponent sacrifices a nonland permanent.\nMatter Absorption — Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield or is put into exile from the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 虚空龙之矛～每当CARDNAME攻击时，每位对手各牺牲一个非地永久物。 物质吸收～每当一个神器从战场进入坟墓场或放逐区时，在CARDNAME上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Skorpekh Destroyer
trans-unit.target: 斯科尔比克毁灭者

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nHyperphase Threshers — Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 死触 高相位斧～每当一个神器在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Nothing can override the hard-wired desire to kill that empowers these rage-driven Necrons.
trans-unit.target: 这些受愤怒驱使的太空死灵动力来自固有杀戮欲望，任何事物都不能抹消此等天性。

trans-unit.source: Skorpekh Lord
trans-unit.target: 斯科尔比克领主

trans-unit.source: Menace\nCommand Protocols — Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.\nUnearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 威慑 指挥程序～由你操控的其他神器生物得+1/+0且具有威慑异能。 破坟{2}{B}（{2}{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。只能于法术时机破坟。）

trans-unit.source: Sloppity Bilepiper
trans-unit.target: 雀跃乐手

trans-unit.source: Jolly Gutpipes — {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: The next creature spell you cast this turn has cascade. (When you cast your next creature spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 逗趣肠管～{2}，{T}，牺牲一个生物：你本回合中施放的下一个生物咒语具有倾曳异能。（当你施放你的下一个生物咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比该咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.source: Tallyman of Nurgle
trans-unit.target: 纳垢书记官

trans-unit.resname: 40K·60 | Tallyman of Nurgle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lifelink\nThe Seven-fold Chant — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. If seven or more creatures died this turn, instead you draw seven cards and you lose 7 life.
trans-unit.target: 系命 七重吟诵～在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物死去，则你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。如果本回合中有七个或更多生物死去，则改为你抓七张牌且失去7点生命。

trans-unit.source: Technomancer
trans-unit.target: 机械巫师

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then return any number of artifact creature cards with total mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨三张牌，然后将任意数量的神器生物牌从你坟墓场移回战场，且这些牌法术力值总和须等于或小于6。

trans-unit.source: "Witchcraft or technology, it is blasphemous, and it must be stopped."\n—Inquisitor Greyfax
trans-unit.target: 「巫术也好，机械也罢，这些都是渎神之举，必须停止。」 ～审判官格雷法克斯

trans-unit.resname: 40K·62 | Their Name Is Death | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Their Name Is Death
trans-unit.target: 死为其名

trans-unit.resname: 40K·62 | Their Name Is Death | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all nonartifact creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有非神器的生物。

trans-unit.resname: 40K·62 | Their Name Is Death | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When the Silent King saw what had been done, he knew at last the true nature of the C'tan, and the doom they had wrought in his name."\n—*The Book of Mournful Night*
trans-unit.target: 「待沉默之王亲见历史之后，他终于看清星神的本性所在，并察觉他们所谋划的末日早已强加于自己身上。」 ～*《哀夜之书》*

trans-unit.resname: 40K·63 | Their Number Is Legion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Their Number Is Legion
trans-unit.target: 数如繁军

trans-unit.resname: 40K·63 | Their Number Is Legion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Create X tapped 2/2 black Necron Warrior artifact creature tokens, then you gain life equal to the number of artifacts you control. Exile CARDNAME.\nYou may cast CARDNAME from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 派出X个已横置的2/2黑色太空死灵／战士衍生神器生物，然后你获得若干生命，其数量等同于由你操控的神器数量。放逐CARDNAME。 你可以从你的坟墓场中施放CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Tomb Blade
trans-unit.target: 古墓之刃

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player loses life equal to the number of creatures they control unless they sacrifice a creature.\nUnearth {6}{B}{B}
Trazyn the Infinite
trans-unit.target: 无限者特拉金

trans-unit.resname: 40K·65 | Trazyn the Infinite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nPrismatic Gallery — As long as CARDNAME is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all artifact cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 死触 棱镜画廊～只要CARDNAME在战场上，它便具有你坟墓场中每张神器牌的所有起动式异能。

trans-unit.source: The Archaeovist of the Solemnace Galleries will not rest until every treasure in the galaxy is safely within his clutches.
trans-unit.target: 索勒姆纳斯博物馆的考古馆长立志将全银河系宝藏悉数稳妥入怀，不达目的誓不休。

trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.source: Necrodermis, the living metal from which all Necrons are made, is endlessly adaptive.
trans-unit.target: 组成太空死灵的活体金属称作「死灵外皮」，它能不断自我适应，永无止境。

trans-unit.source: Skullclamp
trans-unit.target: 备忘夹

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/-1.\nWhenever equipped creature dies, draw two cards.\nEquip {1}
Only the most pious and devoted Imperial servants are granted the posthumous honor of becoming servo-skulls.
trans-unit.target: 只有最忠诚、最热心的帝国仆从，才能在死后享受充当伺服头骨的殊荣。

trans-unit.source: Sol Ring
trans-unit.target: 阳光戒

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
"One day, the dark glory of the void will swallow the light of the stars once and for all!"\n—Magus Lucea Kane
trans-unit.target: 「总有一天，虚空的黑暗荣耀会将星辰光芒彻底吞噬！」 ～占星师露西娅·凯恩

trans-unit.source: Sol Ring
trans-unit.target: 阳光戒

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
"As Horus once besieged the Sol System, we shall bring the rotting Imperium to its knees."\n—Abaddon the Despoiler
trans-unit.target: 「我们要以围攻太阳系的荷鲁斯为榜样，誓让腐朽的人类帝国俯首称臣。」 ～掠夺者阿巴顿

trans-unit.source: Sol Ring
trans-unit.target: 阳光戒

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
"Of all the stars in the Galaxy, Sol is of the Emperor. Its heat is His might. Its light is His revelation."\n—*Lectitio Divinitatus*
trans-unit.target: 「银河系无数恒星，唯太阳属于帝皇。太阳热度象征皇权威武。太阳光芒宣誓帝力浩瀚。」 ～《圣言录》

trans-unit.source: Sol Ring
trans-unit.target: 阳光戒

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
"Once, the C'tan sought to rule us. Now it is they who serve us, their shards powering our great machines."\n—Szarekh, the Silent King
trans-unit.target: 「星神曾试图统治我们。如今吾人却得其服侍，用其碎片保证我们伟大机器威力不断。」 ～沉默之王萨雷赫

trans-unit.source: Centuries' worth of black iron lie beneath the soil of every Imperial world, their civilization built on never-ending strife.

trans-unit.source: Armageddon has become a site of holy pilgrimage for the Orks: a planet where the fighting never stops.

trans-unit.source: In the late stages of a Tyranid invasion, sessile organisms take root in a planet's crust, converting its resources into biomass that can be extracted by the Hive Fleet.
trans-unit.target: 到了泰伦虫族入侵后期，吸附生体便扎根星球地壳，将其资源转化为生物质，供虫巢舰队提取。

trans-unit.source: As the continent sank over the course of eons, the tomb complex slowly flooded. The sleeping Necrons, their stasis crypts corrupted, never awoke.
trans-unit.target: 数千亿年转眼流逝，大陆在这漫长岁月间因风化侵蚀不断下沉，整个墓群也缓慢遭水流侵蚀。而沉眠的太空死灵随着自己的静态墓室遭毁，从此再也无法醒来。
